name: Collins Bussell
description: I’m an active and outgoing guy looking for someone similar to experience life with and have the time of our lives.I’m looking for someone that I can call a friend and a partner. Someone that I can share memories with and have as an ally in my life. Most of all I’m looking for someone who is capable of being trusted and supports my goals and ambitions as much as I support hers. I’ve lived all over the world and have had many wonderful experiences. I’d like to find someone equally as adventurous with a knack for being independent.im looking for the right woman to share all those things with; to explore, laugh, dine, drink, relax… I’m seeking a fun, vibrant woman who laughs first and ask questions later, but also someone who challenges me to be a better man. I’m a pretty good dude who borders on “total gentleman,” and I’d like to think I know how to treat a woman very well. The old-fashioned way, but not “too old-fashioned.” Excuse my humor, but ideally…I’m looking for a woman who I can take care of and who will take care of me. Sound fair? It’s a partnership.
